code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'../../styles/Header.css';import logo from'../../assets/logo2.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();const navigationItems=[{path:'/',label:'Início'},{path:'/transmissoes',label:'Transmissões'},{path:'/ministerios',label:'Ministérios'},{path:'/contato',label:'Contato'}];const isActive=path=>location.pathname===path;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'10px',textDecoration:'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"AD Cavallari",className:"logo-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"AD CAVALLARI"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav-desktop",children:navigationItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive(item.path)?'active':''),style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:item.label},item.path))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"menu-toggle",onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav-mobile ".concat(isMenuOpen?'open':''),children:navigationItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive(item.path)?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:item.label},item.path))})]})});};export default Header;
